explanation: [0-0] Against an orange background, a hand holds a green object, putting it over the foot of a Barbie doll.
[0-2] The fingers pull down the green object until it covers most of the Barbie doll's leg. The shot zooms in, showing a hot glue gun applying a drop of glue to the doll's foot.

[2-4] Then, the scene changes to a red table with white lettering, where one hand holds a piece of white foam and the other uses a craft knife to cut along lines drawn on the foam.
[2-4] Then, the scene changes to a red table with white lettering, where one hand holds a piece of white foam and the other uses a craft knife to cut along lines drawn on the foam.
[4-6] Subsequently, the scene shifts to a blue-green background. One hand holds the white foam while the other peels off the white paper backing, placing the foam on a yellow board for sanding.
[4-6] Subsequently, the scene shifts to a blue-green background. One hand holds the white foam while the other peels off the white paper backing, placing the foam on a yellow board for sanding.

[6-11] Afterwards, against a purple background, one hand sticks two pieces of white foam to the Barbie doll's feet. Immediately after, another hand uses a knife to cut away the hot glue and the green object, removing it to reveal a pair of transparent high heels with white foam attached. The top portion of the high heels is then cut off.
